post.text: Wow! Thank you Louisiana - l love you, and I am with you! Thoughts and prayers are with you, everyday. -DJT

comment.author: Lucille
comment.text: Instead of thoughts and prayers for them to donate to the Red Cross Trump why don't you go there pull up your sleeves throw on some glasses and go see some people our president declared a national disaster and needs money from Congress why don't you call the Congressional representative back from their recess early so they can address the California fires in the Louisiana flood. But I don't hear you calling a single soul just down in Louisiana for a photo op you hypocrite

replies.author: Tylor
replies.text: Donald J. Trump didn't have to go there at all ... He is not the president...yet LOL ~ typical liberal... Where's your boy Obama or that Clinton bimbo during all of this?
